str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A manifestation, disclosure. From phaneroo; exhibition, i.e. expression, a bestowment.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: From sun and phero; to bear together, i.e. to collect, or to conduce; especially advantage.
